text: @cherkeygrl @JHWalz32 @Alyssa_Milano Even N95 masks won’t work if not fitted properly (done in the hospital). Crochet, cloth, construction masks are useless, even dangerous because people tend to constantly adjust with their hands. If self distancing works, why wear masks? If masks work why self distance? Fear porn.
